# Taking the Plunge!
Setting up [node](http://nodejs.org/) + [express](http://expressjs.com/) [mongo](http://www.mongodb.org/)+ [bootstrap](http://twitter.github.com/bootstrap/) on my laptop. Will all this play nicely on Windows? No idea.

[DreamHost](http://dreamhost.com/) seems a pain and would involve TOS violations. Will consider [linode](http://www.linode.com/) shortly...

## Node.js
Windows installer - no more [Cygwin](http://www.cygwin.com) required. I have [Gow](https://github.com/bmatzelle/gow/wiki) installed already so I should be able to power through with cmd.exe for evaluation purposes.
